wikipedia_page.main: Peter Turner (18 December 1876 – 8 February 1970) was a Scottish footballer. He played as an inside forward.

response: * Peter Turner (writer and photographer) (1947–2005), London-born photographer and writer

* Peter Turner (Scottish footballer) (1876–1970), Scottish Association football player
